about_the_game:
The soundtrack for Starship Turd Nugget: Too Cool For Stool is a short and delightful album, containing everything from the opening guitar riff to the Game Over song.

Key Features


  • all original music, produced in-house, specifically for the game
  • mp3s and high-quality wav files included
  • enjoy the chilled-out mellow vibe of the Anticipation track
  • pick up the pace with the high intensity One Way Out track
  • tickle your funny bone with the hilarious (if slightly crude) lyrics in the Game Over track
